channel.title: Only i can log on?
channel.description: wtf help me im the only one who can log on and when i log on it doesnt say connected with local host please help!!!

item.title: Only i can log on?
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

[quote=“chassy13, post:9, topic:254764”][quote author=r34p4g3pk link=topic=336638.msg2615898#msg2615898 date=1231032368]
Yeah, i’ll turn off my firewall, the safest way to do this to to just port forward, yes it can let people connect, but your also letting other things into your computer. Like you said, you can allow exceptions that works too, but theres no point in turning off your firewall when you can do that.
[/quote]
maybe he doesnt
btw this is offtopic: i never get rep++ how do u earn so may chassy
It doesn’t do the same thing. Do you even have any idea what you’re even talking about?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Only i can log on?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

r34p4g3pk:

Yeah, i’ll turn off my firewall, the safest way to do this to to just port forward, yes it can let people connect, but your also letting other things into your computer. Like you said, you can allow exceptions that works too, but theres no point in turning off your firewall when you can do that.

It doesn’t do the same thing. Do you even have any idea what you’re even talking about?

Read full topic

item.title: Only i can log on?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“miyu miyu5, post:6, topic:254764”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=336638.msg2615886#msg2615886 date=1231031660]

Miyu, that doesn’t let people connect.

Your firewall can block connections without an exception.
[/quote]so i was right right[/quote]

You were.

You can also add an exception in your firewall to allow connections from the selected port.

Read full topic
